Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(memory\): Implement comprehensive memory architecture based on Richmond Alake framework

Implements a full memory engineering system following Richmond Alake''s hierarchy:
- Episodic Memory: Conversation search with date filtering and weighted scoring
- Semantic Memory: Enhanced archival memory with tags
- Procedural Memory: Workflow trajectory storage and retrieval
- Associative Memory: Graph-based memory relationships in Firestore

New services:
- episodic-memory.ts: Conversation search, recency scoring
- procedural-memory.ts: Workflow persistence, best practice lookup
- associative-memory.ts: Memory graph with edges \(similar_to, caused, etc.\)
- sleeptime-agent.ts: Background memory consolidation
- memory-bridge.ts: Letta <-> Firestore synchronization
- conversations.ts: Parallel conversation threads API
- archival-tags.ts: Tag-based memory organization
- memory-types.ts: Unified MemoryUnit schema

New agent tools \(15 total\):
- letta_search_conversations, letta_get_recent_context \(episodic\)
- letta_find_workflow, letta_get_best_practice \(procedural\)
- letta_find_related_memories, letta_link_memories \(associative\)
- letta_save_with_tags, letta_search_by_tags, letta_suggest_tags \(tags\)

Harness integration:
- Auto-persist successful workflows to procedural memory
- Trigger sleep-time consolidation after N messages

Includes 46 passing unit tests.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
